content.question: A hoop is released from rest at the top of Ramp <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math> and rolls down the ramp without slipping. When the hoop reaches the bottom of Ramp <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math>, it has translational kinetic energy <math alttext="K sub t A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>tA</mtext></msub></math>. The hoop is then released from rest at the top of Ramp <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>, which has the same height and shape as Ramp <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math>, but there is negligible friction between the hoop and Ramp <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>, so the hoop slides down Ramp <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math> without rolling. When the hoop reaches the bottom of Ramp <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>, it has translational kinetic energy <math alttext="K sub t B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>tB</mtext></msub></math>. Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="K sub t B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>tB</mtext></msub></math> and <math alttext="K sub t A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>tA</mtext></msub></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="K sub t B is less than K sub t A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>tB</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>tA</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="K sub t B equals K sub t A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>tB</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>tA</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="K sub t B is greater than K sub t A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>tB</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>tA</mtext></msub></math>
The comparison cannot be made without knowing the coefficient of static friction between the hoop and Ramp <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math>.

content.answer: <math alttext="K sub t B is greater than K sub t A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>tB</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>tA</mtext></msub></math>
